channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: Pentagon says it's cutting ties with 'woke' Harvard, ending military training
item.description: Amid an ongoing standoff between Harvard and the White House, the Defense Department said it plans to cut ties with the Ivy League — ending military training, fellowships and certificate programs.
item.content:encoded:
Amid an ongoing standoff between Harvard and the White House, the Defense Department said it plans to cut ties with the Ivy League — ending military training, fellowships and certificate programs.

(Image credit: Kevin Wolf)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: 'Washington Post' CEO resigns after going AWOL during massive job cuts
item.description: Washington Post chief executive and publisher Will Lewis has resigned just days after the newspaper announced massive layoffs.
item.content:encoded:
Washington Post chief executive and publisher Will Lewis has resigned just days after the newspaper announced massive layoffs.

(Image credit: Allison Robbert/AP)
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: One week since Nancy Guthrie was last seen, here's what we know
item.description: Nancy Guthrie was last seen a week ago. In the days since, investigators have launched a frantic search to return the 84-year-old home.
item.content:encoded:
Nancy Guthrie was last seen a week ago. In the days since, investigators have launched a frantic search to return the 84-year-old home.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: In this Icelandic drama, a couple quietly drifts apart
item.description: Icelandic director Hlynur Pálmason weaves scenes of quiet domestic life against the backdrop of an arresting landscape in his newest film.
item.content:encoded: Icelandic director Hlynur Pálmason weaves scenes of quiet domestic life against the backdrop of an arresting landscape in his newest film.
item.dc:creator: Teresa Xie

item.title: After the Fall: How Olympic figure skaters soar after stumbling on the ice
item.description: Olympic figure skating is often seems to take athletes to the very edge of perfection, but even the greatest stumble and fall. How do they pull themselves together again on the biggest world stage? Toughness, poise and practice.
item.content:encoded:
Olympic figure skating is often seems to take athletes to the very edge of perfection, but even the greatest stumble and fall. How do they pull themselves together again on the biggest world stage? Toughness, poise and practice.

(Image credit: Matthew Stockman)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: They're cured of leprosy. Why do they still live in leprosy colonies?
item.description: Leprosy is one of the least contagious diseases around — and perhaps one of the most misunderstood. The colonies are relics of a not-too-distant past when those diagnosed with leprosy were exiled.
item.content:encoded:
Leprosy is one of the least contagious diseases around — and perhaps one of the most misunderstood. The colonies are relics of a not-too-distant past when those diagnosed with leprosy were exiled.

(Image credit: Pam Fessler for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Pam Fessler

item.title: This season, 'The Pitt' is about what doesn't happen in one day
item.description: The first season of The Pitt was about acute problems. The second is about chronic ones.
item.content:encoded:
The first season of The Pitt was about acute problems. The second is about chronic ones.

(Image credit: Warrick Page)
item.dc:creator: Linda Holmes

item.title: Lindsey Vonn is set to ski the Olympic downhill race with a torn ACL. How?
item.description: An ACL tear would keep almost any other athlete from competing -- but not Lindsey Vonn, the 41-year-old superstar skier who is determined to cap off an incredible comeback from retirement with one last shot at an Olympic medal.
item.content:encoded:
An ACL tear would keep almost any other athlete from competing -- but not Lindsey Vonn, the 41-year-old superstar skier who is determined to cap off an incredible comeback from retirement with one last shot at an Olympic medal.

(Image credit: Marco Trovati)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: The CIA World Factbook is dead. Here's how I came to love it
item.description: The Factbook survived the Cold War and became a hit online. It mixed quirky cultural notes and trivia with maps, data, and photos taken by CIA officers. But it was discontinued this week.
item.content:encoded: The Factbook survived the Cold War and became a hit online. It mixed quirky cultural notes and trivia with maps, data, and photos taken by CIA officers. But it was discontinued this week.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: State Department will delete X posts from before Trump returned to office
item.description: The policy change orders the removal of any post made by official State Department accounts on X before President Trump returned to office in 2025.
item.content:encoded:
The policy change orders the removal of any post made by official State Department accounts on X before President Trump returned to office in 2025.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Shannon Bond
